resources.string: Be sure to win next time!
You didn\'t finish the last game. Want to continue?

In each game, a noun of 5 letters is guessed. In order to guess it, enter words of 5 letters into the field, and we will give you the cue which letters are in the hidden word and which are not. So, you entered a word, and the letters in it changed color.
The letters %1$s are gray, the hidden word does not contain them.\nThe letters %2$s are white, they are in the hidden word, but are in other places.
The letters %1$s are yellow, they are in the hidden word and in the right place.
If all the letters are red - most likely the word does not meet one of the requirements:\n - common noun\n - in the singular.
If all the letters are yellow, then you have guessed the word. A total of 6 attempts are given.
Some words may seem complex or fictional. In the next update, we will add the ability to find out the meaning of the hidden word.
Signing in failed. Check internet connection.
Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Couldn`t start signing in with Google.
No Google Accounts found. Check internet.
Signing in with Google canceled by user.
There is no user with this email address. Register or login using one of the methods below.
The password is invalid or you does not have a password. Press \"Forgot password?\"
The email address is already in use by another account.
Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed login attempts. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
No problem! Just enter the email address that you signed up with to reset it.
There is no user corresponding to the given email address.
The letter was successfully sent to %1$s. Follow the instructions in it and come back to log in with a new password.

By continuing to log in as an anonymous player, you assume the risk of losing game progress and achievements. To avoid this, register using one of the methods indicated on the previous screen. You can also do this later in your account.
